kwb.umberto 0.1.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Tutorial (Umberto NXT, v7.1.0.13.503)
    • Tutorial (Umberto LCA+, v10.0.3.146)
  • Changelog

Create pivot list

Source: R/data_aggregation.R
create_pivot_list.Rd

Create pivot list

create_pivot_list(pivot_data, arrange_cols = "process")

Arguments

pivot_data

privot data as retrieved from function pivot_data()
arrange_cols

columns used for arranging the data (default: "process")

Value

a list of results, where each element contains the result table for one lci_method

Examples


umberto7_csv_dir <- system.file("extdata/umberto-nxt_v7.1.0.13.503",
package = "kwb.umberto")
umberto7_rawdata <- kwb.umberto::import_rawdata(csv_dir = umberto7_csv_dir)

umberto7_data_grouped <- kwb.umberto::group_data(umberto7_rawdata)
umberto7_data_pivot <- kwb.umberto::pivot_data(umberto7_data_grouped)
umberto7_data_pivot_list <- kwb.umberto::create_pivot_list(umberto7_data_pivot)
#> Joining, by = c("lci_method", "process")
#> Joining, by = c("lci_method", "process")

umberto10_csv_dir <- system.file("extdata/umberto-lca+_v10.1.0.3.146",
package = "kwb.umberto")
umberto10_rawdata <- kwb.umberto::import_rawdata(csv_dir = umberto10_csv_dir)
#> [1] "Importing csv file 'C:/Users/mrustl.KWB/Documents/RProjects/kwb.umberto/inst/extdata/umberto-lca+_v10.1.0.3.146/smartech2_model-v0.1.0_input-v0.3.1.csv'"
#> Using ',' as decimal and '.' as grouping mark. Use read_delim() for more control.
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   Project = col_character(),
#>   Model = col_character(),
#>   Net = col_character(),
#>   Timestamp = col_character(),
#>   Product = col_character(),
#>   `Product Name` = col_character(),
#>   `Product Arrow` = col_character(),
#>   `Product Flow Amount` = col_character(),
#>   `LCI Method` = col_character(),
#>   Phase = col_character(),
#>   Process = col_character(),
#>   `Material Type` = col_character(),
#>   Material = col_character(),
#>   Quantity = col_double(),
#>   Unit = col_character()
#> )
umberto10_data_grouped <- kwb.umberto::group_data(umberto10_rawdata)
umberto10_data_pivot <- kwb.umberto::pivot_data(umberto10_data_grouped)
umberto10_data_pivot_list <- kwb.umberto::create_pivot_list(umberto10_data_pivot)
